virality_potential.justification: Significant environmental milestone in crypto with clear data (99.99% reduction) likely to be shared widely in tech/eco communities.

informative_value.justification: Provides verifiable, impactful data about Ethereum's energy consumption changes post-Merge.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Neutral presentation of factual information without emotional language.

duration_of_impact.justification: Key sustainability metric that will remain relevant in blockchain discussions for years.

virality_potential.justification: Major exchange launching L2 solution with ambitious user adoption target (1B+ people).

informative_value.justification: Official announcement of Base L2 with clear technical purpose and roadmap.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Positive tone emphasizing economic freedom and scalability improvements.

duration_of_impact.justification: Infrastructure development that could shape crypto adoption for years.

virality_potential.justification: Emphasizes massive user base integration (110M users) likely to excite crypto community.

informative_value.justification: Highlights strategic implications of Coinbase's L2 but lacks technical details.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Strong positive language ('massive day', 'how the world goes bankless').

duration_of_impact.justification: Strategic partnership impact will remain relevant through product rollout phases.

virality_potential.justification: Official Coinbase announcement with exceptional engagement metrics (10k+ likes).

informative_value.justification: Detailed technical specifications and clear roadmap for Base L2 platform.

duration_of_impact.justification: Foundational infrastructure announcement with multi-year adoption timeline.

virality_potential.justification: Breaking news format with urgency indicators (siren emojis) and thread engagement.

informative_value.justification: Technical details about OP Stack integration and maintenance structure.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Positive excitement conveyed through emojis and engagement invitation.

duration_of_impact.justification: Will remain relevant through Base's development cycle but may be superseded by updates.

virality_potential.justification: Concise announcement format suitable for quick sharing in crypto circles.

informative_value.justification: Clear statement of partnership (Optimism) but lacks implementation details.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Neutral reporting style without emotional language.

duration_of_impact.justification: Important partnership note but likely overshadowed by official announcements.

virality_potential.justification: Historic technical milestone (transactions surpassing Ethereum) with visual proof.

informative_value.justification: Specific performance metric with ecosystem implications.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Proud tone celebrating community achievement ('huge milestone').

duration_of_impact.justification: Benchmark data point that will be referenced in scaling discussions.

virality_potential.justification: Signals paradigm shift in Ethereum roadmap but from individual account.

informative_value.justification: Reiterates Arbitrum milestone with historical context.

duration_of_impact.justification: Important but less impactful than the original network announcement.

virality_potential.justification: Technical semantic debate likely limited to crypto-native audiences.

informative_value.justification: Educates about blockchain fundamentals but presents opinion as fact.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Neutral technical correction despite imperative tone.

duration_of_impact.justification: Evergreen educational content about wallet mechanics.

virality_potential.justification: Provocative Bitcoin/ETH comparison likely to spark community debates.

informative_value.justification: Opinionated comparison using hyperbolic emojis rather than data.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Negative framing through poop emojis and criticism of ETH fundamentals.

duration_of_impact.justification: Tribal arguments tend to resurface but rarely shift long-term narratives.
